backend/main.mo: Defines a canister with an internal secret and an authenticateSecretToken method that traps if the provided token does not match.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting an old actor’s serverPasscode field into the new internalSecret field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining how to run, deploy, and configure link‑only access using a backend secret token.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the romantic theme and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with Valentine-themed metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that enforces secret‑token authorization and drives the prank → transition → proposal → victory scene flow.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Access: Empty placeholder file for the former passcode gate UI.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Confet: Canvas‑based confetti burst animation that runs for about three seconds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Cracki: Animated SVG heart that progressively reveals crack lines over time.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Evasiv: NO button that dodges user interaction with random movement, scaling, shake animation, and denial popup behavior.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Glitch: Displays a glitchy 404 screen with shake and flash animations.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartP: Generates floating heart particles with randomized positions and animation timings.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartR: Creates falling heart animations with randomized sizes and timing.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Invali: Shows an animated decorative invalid‑link error card with floating hearts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MusicT: Provides a button to play or pause background music using an Audio element.
frontend/src/components/valentine/scenes: A themed 404 scene with glitch text, particles, and a cracking heart graphic.
Valentine proposal screen featuring a yes button handler and evasive no button.
Victory screen with confetti, heart rain, and a customizable romantic message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasscodeGate.ts: Empty placeholder file for a passcode gate hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretTokenGate.ts: Validates a URL token via backend and tracks authorization state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles including Tailwind setup, romantic color variables, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color variables, typography/container/animation plugins, and extended fonts, radii, and shadows.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata for a single‑page Valentine’s prank site including scenes, animations, link‑only access, and known issues requiring fixes.
